About Me

I'm a graduated Programmer Analyst living in Chile and i have 3 years of experience working in IT, mostly on web development.
I'm always learning and constantly adapting to the industry changes, looking for new technologies to improve the quality of my work.
Actually, I'm using Javascript (Typescript) and Python to create amazing and realiable web applications.

In relation to frontend development, i'm really comfortable working with React.js, Next.js and CSS frameworks like bootstrap and tailwind.

My projects

< App reservas DAE />

Web APP made with Django Rest Framework and a frontend made with React.Js and Material-Ui (MUI v5) component library.

The main use of APP reservas DAE is to make reservations of the Multi-Purpose Sports Field of Inacap La Serena.

Github Link

< CPA fixed Assets System />

Web APP made with Django Rest Framework and a frontend made with React.Js and Material-Ui (MUI v5) component library.

The main use of this App is to keep an active database of the fixed Assets of an Educational institution, it's inventory and to make reports.

< PABLORAM.DEV Portfolio />

Well, This is the portfolio you're currently browsing, Made with Vanilla Js, HTML5 and CSS3.

GSAP is the library used to make the scroll animations and a the little 3D Cube of my Stacks is made with THREE.Js
